Description: Devon Energy Corporation and its affiliates agreed to pay the United States $3,492,463 to resolve claims that PennzEnergy, a predecessor to Devon, violated the False Claims Act by knowingly underpaying royalties owed on natural gas produced from federal and Indian lands.

Devon Energy Production Company (formerly Pennzoil Company) agreed to pay $11.9 million to resolve claims that it underpaid royalties due for oil produced on Federal and Indian leases between January 1, 1988 and December 31, 1998.

Agency: Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement

Company: Devon Energy Production Company, L. P.

Description: Devon Energy Corporation, an Oklahoma-based oil and natural gas exploration and production company, and its affiliates Devon Energy Corp. (Oklahoma) and Devon Energy Production Company, LP agreed to pay $6.15 million to resolve allegations of violating the False Claims Act by underpaying and underreporting royalties for natural gas from federal lands in Wyoming and New Mexico.
